nodes.text: Pomegrail was a substance that gave off a noticeable odor. Around 18 BBY, Jax Pavan, a Jedi Knight turned investigator, noticed that Baron Vlaçan Umber smelled slightly of pomegrail when they met inside of the baron's apartment, which was located in the Manarai Hills district of the planet Coruscant. Pavan was unable to tell if the smell was naturally occurring or artificial in nature.
Pomegrail first appeared as a smell in Coruscant Nights II: Street of Shadows, a 2008 novel written by Michael Reaves.
